attributes.action: Display the Speed Limit on Speed Camera Boxes
attributes.additional_details:
Make it a Statutory Requirement or Regulation to display the applicable Speed Limit on the reverse of every Speed Camera Box throughout the United Kingdom - in order to:
1) Avoid Motorist ambiguity or uncertainty
2) Remove allegations of Police entrapment
3) Improve Road Safety for all Users - Public or otherwise
4) Endorse their effective Deterrent on Speeding
5) Simple Cost-effective improvement to existing operational apparatus
